__e: More so the beasts who do battle in them.
You may be the only two beasts left on the planet.
That line that we thought was so clear between us and the things that we hunted... ain't so clear, is it?
Tori, if they don't know you're a beast and they don't know about beasts, then maybe this has nothing to do with beasts.
I'm just trying to help find the animals that slaughtered that poor bride.
But what I do know is... the sooner I don't have to spend any more of my life dealing with... beasts...
